Text.val: Author: Peter van der Veen; created: 15.10.2001
24.10.2014 GB SCR16828 Moved this program from backup folder
25.04.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
23.05.2011 GB SCR16477 Fixed problem with parameters passed to the BMQ005
11.05.2011 SH SCR16448 Removed GNRL_CURRENCY (was not used)
09.05.2011 GB SCR16396 Replaced GNRL_CODE by CLNT114_COUNTRY
14.06.2010 GB SCR15540 Replacement calls the BMQ001 by the BMQ005
01.12.2008 GB Changed update for BTCP_CURRENCYACC, BTCP_CURRENCYPAY in
store a BATCH_PAYMENT row
06.09.2007 SH SCR12890 Added test on CLNT212_INTERCREDIT = N,
CLNT212_CONFIDENTIAL = N
11.04.2007 AK SCR12412 exclude invoices from legal debtors in 'table INVOICE'
30.03.2006 SH SCR10734 Added new part to handle exchange/rounding
11.11.2005 JJ SCR9401 added check INVO_SCHEDULEDATE is not null
12.09.2005 JJ SCR9064 tsk INVOICE debc/actuali moved RP handling to TP
22.10.2004 JJ SCR7231 credit note selection on paym code also based on GSET
03.09.2004 JJ SCR6902 Use of selection on paym code matching invo based on GSET
19.08.2004 SH SCR6813 Extended test with "or ISNULL(DEBH_DCIS0BOOKINGNOTALLOWED)
see previous remark
18.08.2004 SH SCR6813 Extended first selection of INVO with
DEBH_DCIS0BOOKINGNOTALLOWED <> Y (DEBH_NO = INVO_DEBH_NO)
22.04.2004 JJ SCR5747 cont. dropped check on BIPV for "option all invoices"
16.04.2004 SH SCR3627 Extended argument list for BPH112, see SCR for details
23.03.2004 JJ SCR5776 clear MQ 80 at program start
18.03.2004 JJ SCR5747 If balance = 0 but there are pending batches, skip debtor
25.09.2003 JJ SCR4266 cont. -Added INVO_CURRENCY to matching
-Fixed BPIV check for "table INVOICE sort of INVDATE"
24.09.2003 JJ SCR4266 cont. removed indexes from links for "existing BPIV" check
04.09.2003 JJ SCR4266 added existing BPIV check credit notes (tsk table INVOICE)
04.03.2003 JJ SCR1779 cont. option all invoices now in single payment
27.02.2003 JJ SCR1779 workaround: update to V.BATCHID in TP, dropped test verif
24.02.2003 JJ added test verifys to rs
20.02.2003 JJ SCR3037 additional init BTCH
09.08.2002 JJ SCR1779 cont. undo of change of 07.08
08.08.2002 JJ SCR1779 cont. changed Characterset V.BATCHID from OEM to ANSI
07.08.2002 JJ SCR1779 cont. moved fetching of batch ID to parent of writing task
29.07.2002 JJ SCR1779 -disabled caching
-moved calls BPH112 from tasks writing BTCP to immediate parent
21.05.2002 JJ SCR1189 continued, changed argument call BPH250 to alphanumeric
-Disabled transaction in task "table CLIENT"
-Changed index selection main file in task table INVOICE to X_INVO_01
-Changed transaction of task table INVOICE to be on DEBC level as per specs
-When matchin indiviBTCP for invo
-Check on group prefix level if DEBB_ACTINVAC = 0
-Added subtree to book of all invoices
19.02.2002 JJ SCR856 implemented new field BTCH_HYPB_BATCHNO
-- get payment code for rounding differences
// Close last batch (V.BATCH_ID <> 0
where claus
14.05.2002 JJ switched main file index to X_INVO_01 (debc/aactuali)
where claus
13.03.06 CO SCR10618: additional range:
SCR1189 For each DEBC check if DEBB_ACTINCVAC=0
In this case book off all outstanding invoices instead of matching
Skip debtor if DEBB_ACTINVAC = 0 but BTPC exists with status < 2
Book batch if max number of payments reached while matching
Sort on INVO_INVDATE; end task after first record is written
13.03.06 CO SCR10618: additional range:
-- Only if an invoice is booked handle possible exchange/rounding differences
Write row to mult to prevent debit note from being selected again
Report invoices to MQ80
// At the end of a batch...
// We have to end the parent task if we succesfully wrote one line
-- an exchange or rounding difference exists

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(BPIV_AMOUNTCURRPAY) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/BPIV where BPIV_BTCH_ID = :2 and BPIV_BTCP_LINENO = :3 for fetch only

Text.val: If previous row was last of batch book now
to ensure we don't get "record has been updated/lost" errors
-- Only if invoices are booked off; one payment row (BTCP) was stored; handle
possible exchange/rounding differences
Number of lines for booking reached, update status and set flag to book
Raise flag BTCP stored so all invoices of this debtor are in one payment
-- an exchange or rounding difference exists

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(BPIV_AMOUNTCURRPAY) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/BPIV where BPIV_BTCH_ID = :2 and BPIV_BTCP_LINENO = :3 for fetch only

Text.val: Debtor not skipped due to BTPC.. check for invoices with SCHEDULEDATE = null
Range: <>0:
Now there ARE records found in INVO within the required range
and this means, that for this debtor no "book of all invoices" has to be done:

SQL_STMT_U.val: select count(*) from :1/INVO where INVO_DEBC_NO =:2 and INVO_AACTUALI<> 0 and INVO_SCHEDULEDATE is null for fetch only optimize for 100 rows
